item.title: TARP-VP: Towards Evaluation of Transferred Adversarial Robustness and Privacy on Label Mapping Visual Prompting Models
item.description: TARP-VP reveals a surprising lack of trade-off between adversarial robustness and privacy for label mapping visual prompting models, showing that transferred adversarial training significantly improve…
